name: Inverite IBV Integration for WordPress
author: Pier-Yves C Valade

sections.description:
A simple way to add an Inverite Instant Banking Verification iFrame Integration to your WordPress website.

For more infos, please visit https://pycvala.de/.

Trademarks to Inverite and Marble are owned by their respective owners.
sections.installation:
To use the plugin, install it from the WordPress plugin directory or manually following these steps:

  1. Install or Upload the plugin to your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the shortcode like so: [inverite-iframe site-id="<site-id>"].
  4. Enjoy!
